Articles.Content:
Hi all,

As the title says, the game crashes to desktop every time I start the game for the first time after boot up. Sometimes it crashes a few more times in-game. But more often than not, it run fine for the duration of my game time.

This is the KSP.log files from the last 3 start-up’s:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B9nI5bkIqoAEaXFIT1RIR1lTREE/view?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B9nI5bkIqoAEdFM1cUFOQVFEN1E/view?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B9nI5bkIqoAEdGcxaUdQN20zTXM/view?usp=sharing

My system spec.:

Linux Ubuntu 14.04 LTS

Intel i7 920

12 GB RAM

GTX 770 2 GB

It's not that big a problem, just an annoyance. But I really hope some guru can help. Thanks in advance.

PS. Let me know if you need anything else.
